title: Classification of 1-super-transitive quantum subgroups in type A
summary: We define a notion of super-transitivity for ètale algebra objects $A \in \mathcal{C}(\mathfrak{sl}_N, k)$. This definition is a direct analogue of the notion of super-transitivity for subfactors, and measures at what depth the first ``new stuff'' appears in the category of $A$-modules internal to $\mathcal{C}(\mathfrak{sl}_N, k)$. Our main theorem gives a classification of all 1-super-transitive ètale algebra objects in $\mathcal{C}(\mathfrak{sl}_N, k)$ running over all $N,k \in \mathbb{N}$. Our classification captures all known infinite families of non-pointed ètale algebras in $\mathcal{C}(\mathfrak{sl}_N, k)$, and includes all but 16 of the known non-pointed ètale algebra objects in these categories. These remaining 16 known examples have super-transitivities between 2 and 4.

AI.tldr: 该论文定义了étale代数对象的超传递性概念，并分类了所有1-超传递的étale代数对象，涵盖了已知的无限族和大部分非点状étale代数。
AI.motivation: 研究étale代数对象的超传递性是为了衡量在范畴内部A-模中"新内容"出现的深度，这是子因子理论中超传递性概念的直接类比。
AI.method: 定义了étale代数对象的超传递性概念，作为子因子理论中相应概念的类比。主要定理对𝒞(𝔰𝔩_N, k)中所有1-超传递的étale代数对象进行了分类，涵盖了所有N,k∈ℕ。
AI.result: 分类结果捕获了𝒞(𝔰𝔩_N, k)中所有已知的非点状étale代数的无限族，并包含了除16个已知例子外的所有非点状étale代数对象。这16个剩余例子的超传递性在2到4之间。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功地将子因子理论中的超传递性概念推广到étale代数对象，并给出了1-超传递étale代数的完整分类，为理解这些代数结构提供了重要工具。

title: Representations of Spectrum of GL(m) type Quantum Matrices
summary:
In the present paper we are dealing with reflection equation algebras ${\cal L}(R)$ corresponding to even skew-invertible Hecke symmetries. Our main result consists in computing the characters of the spectral values of the generating matrix $L$ of ${\cal L}(R)$ in finite-dimensional representations labeled by partitions of integers. As is known, the spectral values belong to an algebraic extension of the center of the reflection equation algebra and elements of the center can be presented as symmetric functions in spectral values. As an application of our approach, we calculate the characters of the power sums $\mathrm{Tr}_R(L^n)$ in the mentioned finite dimensional representations.
  In a particular case of the Drinfeld-Jimbo $R$-matrix the enveloping algebra $U(gl(N))$ can be obtained as a specific limit of the reflection equation algebra. In this limit our results for power sums coincide with the those obtained in [PP].

AI.tldr: 该论文计算了对应于偶斜可逆Hecke对称性的反射方程代数中生成矩阵L的谱值特征，以及幂和Tr_R(L^n)在有限维表示中的特征。
AI.motivation: 研究反射方程代数中生成矩阵的谱值特征及其在有限维表示中的表现，为理解这类代数结构提供新的计算工具和理论框架。
AI.method: 使用偶斜可逆Hecke对称性对应的反射方程代数，计算生成矩阵L的谱值在由整数划分标记的有限维表示中的特征，并应用该方法计算幂和Tr_R(L^n)的特征。
AI.result: 成功计算了反射方程代数中生成矩阵L的谱值特征，并得到了幂和Tr_R(L^n)在有限维表示中的特征公式。在Drinfeld-Jimbo R-矩阵的特殊情况下，当反射方程代数极限化为U(gl(N))时，结果与已有文献一致。
AI.conclusion: 建立了反射方程代数中谱值特征的计算方法，为这类代数结构的研究提供了新的工具，并在特殊情况下验证了与经典结果的兼容性。

title: A Magnus group construction for a class of Borcherds algebras
summary: We construct a group associated to a class of Borcherds algebras that admit a direct sum decomposition into a Kac--Moody (or semi-simple) subalgebra and a pair of free Lie subalgebras. Such Borcherds algebras have no mutually orthogonal imaginary simple roots.Our group is a semi-direct product of a Kac--Moody (or semi-simple) group and a Magnus group of invertible formal power series corresponding to a basis of a certain highest weight module determined by the simple imaginary roots. We show that our group is independent of this choice of basis, up to isomorphism. We apply our construction to a number of concrete examples, such as certain Borcherds algebras formed using root lattices of hyperbolic Kac--Moody algebras, the Monster Lie algebra, Monstrous Lie algebras of Fricke type and the gnome Lie algebra.

AI.tldr: 该论文构建了一个与特定Borcherds代数类相关的群结构，该群是Kac-Moody群与Magnus群的半直积，并应用于多个具体代数实例。
AI.motivation: 研究一类特殊的Borcherds代数，这类代数可以分解为Kac-Moody子代数和自由李子代数的直和，且没有相互正交的虚单根。需要为这类代数构建相应的群结构。
AI.method: 构造一个半直积群：Kac-Moody（或半单）群与Magnus群的半直积，其中Magnus群对应于由虚单根决定的最高权模基的可逆形式幂级数。证明该构造与基的选择无关。
AI.result: 成功构建了与这类Borcherds代数相关的群结构，并证明该群在同构意义下独立于基的选择。将构造应用于多个具体例子，包括双曲Kac-Moody代数的根格构造的Borcherds代数、Monster李代数、Fricke型Monstrous李代数和gnome李代数。
AI.conclusion: 为特定类型的Borcherds代数建立了系统的群构造理论，该构造具有基选择无关性，并成功应用于多个重要的数学物理实例，扩展了Borcherds代数与群论之间的联系。

title: Deformation quantisation of exact shifted symplectic structures, with an application to vanishing cycles
comment: 47pp; v2 minor additions (Verdier duality incorporated in comparison)
summary:
We extend the author's and CPTVV's correspondence between shifted symplectic and Poisson structures to establish a correspondence between exact shifted symplectic structures and non-degenerate shifted Poisson structures with formal derivation, a concept generalising constructions by De Wilde and Lecomte. Our formulation is sufficiently general to encompass derived algebraic, analytic and $\mathcal{C}^{\infty}$ stacks, as well as Lagrangians and non-commutative generalisations. We also show that non-degenerate shifted Poisson structures with formal derivation carry unique self-dual deformation quantisations in any setting where the latter can be formulated.
  One application is that for (not necessarily exact) $0$-shifted symplectic structures in analytic and $\mathcal{C}^{\infty}$ settings, it follows that the author's earlier parametrisations of quantisations are in fact independent of any choice of associator, and generalise Fedosov's parametrisation of quantisations for classical manifolds.
  Our main application is to complex $(-1)$-shifted symplectic structures, showing that our unique quantisation of the canonical exact structure, a sheaf of twisted $BD_0$-algebras with derivation, gives rise to BBDJS's perverse sheaf of vanishing cycles, equipped with its monodromy operator.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了精确移位辛结构与具有形式导数的非退化移位泊松结构之间的对应关系，并证明了这种结构在可定义变形量子化的任何设置中都携带唯一的自对偶变形量子化。
AI.motivation: 扩展作者和CPTVV关于移位辛结构与泊松结构之间的对应关系，建立更一般的对应关系，涵盖派生代数、解析和光滑栈，以及拉格朗日子流形和非交换推广。
AI.method: 通过形式化推导的概念，将精确移位辛结构与具有形式导数的非退化移位泊松结构对应起来，这种形式化推导推广了De Wilde和Lecomte的构造。
AI.result: 证明了非退化移位泊松结构在可定义变形量子化的任何设置中都携带唯一的自对偶变形量子化；对于0-移位辛结构，量子化参数化不依赖于任何结合子的选择；对于复(-1)-移位辛结构，给出了BBDJS的消失循环层及其单值算子。
AI.conclusion: 建立了精确移位辛结构与具有形式导数的非退化移位泊松结构之间的对应关系，并证明了这种结构具有唯一的自对偶变形量子化，这一结果统一了派生代数、解析和光滑几何中的量子化理论。

title: Vertex $F$-Algebras and Their Associated Lie Algebra
summary: Vertex $F$-algebras are a deformation of the concept of an ordinary vertex algebra in which the additive formal group law is replaced by an arbitrary formal group law $F$. The main theorem of this paper constructs a Lie algebra from a vertex $F$-algebra - for the additive formal group law, this extends Borcherds' well-known construction for ordinary vertex algebras. Our construction involves the new concept of an $F$-residue and some other new algebraic concepts, which are deformations of familiar concepts for the special case of an additive formal group law.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了顶点F-代数的李代数结构，将Borcherds对普通顶点代数的构造推广到任意形式群律F的情况
AI.motivation: 顶点F-代数是普通顶点代数的变形，其中加法形式群律被替换为任意形式群律F。需要将Borcherds对普通顶点代数的李代数构造推广到更一般的情况
AI.method: 引入F-剩余的新概念以及其他新的代数概念，这些概念是加法形式群律特殊情况下熟悉概念的变形。通过这些新工具构建顶点F-代数的李代数结构
AI.result: 成功构造了从顶点F-代数到李代数的对应关系，对于加法形式群律的特殊情况，这推广了Borcherds对普通顶点代数的构造
AI.conclusion: 顶点F-代数的李代数构造为理解这类代数结构提供了新的框架，F-剩余等新概念为研究形式群律相关的代数结构开辟了新途径

title: Hyperbolic structures on link complements, octahedral decompositions, and quantum $\mathfrak{sl}_2$
summary: Hyperbolic structures on link complements (equivalently, representations of the fundamental group into $\operatorname{SL}_2(\mathbb{C})$) can be described algebraically by using the octahedral decomposition determined by a link diagram. The decomposition (like any ideal triangulation) gives a set of gluing equations in shape parameters whose solutions are hyperbolic structures. We show that these equations can be obtained from Kashaev-Reshetikhin's braiding on the Kac-de Concini quantum group $\mathcal{U}_ξ(\mathfrak{sl}_2)$ at a root of unity $ξ$. This braiding gives coordinates on the $\operatorname{SL}_2(\mathbb{C})$ representation variety of a link and our work shows how to interpret these geometrically.

AI.tldr: 该论文展示了如何从Kashaev-Reshetikhin在根单位处的量子群$\mathcal{U}_ξ(\mathfrak{sl}_2)$上的编织操作，推导出描述链环补集双曲结构的八面体分解方程。
AI.motivation: 研究链环补集的双曲结构（等价于基本群到$\operatorname{SL}_2(\mathbb{C})$的表示）的代数描述方法，探索量子群理论与双曲几何之间的联系。
AI.method: 使用链环图确定的八面体分解（理想三角剖分），得到形状参数的粘合方程。通过Kashaev-Reshetikhin在根单位处的量子群$\mathcal{U}_ξ(\mathfrak{sl}_2)$上的编织操作，推导这些方程。
AI.result: 证明了八面体分解方程可以从量子群的编织操作获得，该编织操作为链环的$\operatorname{SL}_2(\mathbb{C})$表示簇提供了坐标，并给出了这些坐标的几何解释。
AI.conclusion: 量子群理论中的编织操作与双曲几何中的八面体分解方程之间存在深刻联系，为理解链环补集的双曲结构提供了新的代数几何视角。
